2025-02-03.title: S&P 500 Will Sink as Trump’s Tariffs Hit Earnings, Goldman’s Kostin Warns
2025-02-03.description: There’s a risk of a 5% slump in US stocks over the coming months as the latest round of tariffs by the Trump administration crimp earnings forecasts, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.

2025-02-03.title: Wall Street Backs the Dollar’s Wild Rally To Gather Steam
2025-02-03.description: Wall Street banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. think there is still plenty of money to be made buying the dollar, even after US President Donald Trump’s tariff-push sent the greenback soaring.

2025-01-31.title: Goldman Sachs AM Seeks Up to $3 Billion for Climate Credit Fund
2025-01-31.description: Alternative lending giant Goldman Sachs Asset Management is looking to raise as much as $3 billion for a new climate credit strategy, people with knowledge of the matter said.

2025-01-13.title: Goldman Sees Dollar Rallying 5% or More as US Growth Dominates
2025-01-13.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has upgraded its dollar forecasts, citing a robust US economy and likely higher tariffs that may slow monetary easing.

2025-01-13.title: Float Financial Announces $70 Million Investment Round Led by Growth Equity at Goldman Sachs Alternatives to Build Canada’s Most Complete Business Finance Solution
2025-01-13.description: Growth Equity at Goldman Sachs Alternatives leads this funding round of over CAD$70M, joined by other prominent investors including OMERS Ventures, FJ Labs, Garage Capital and Teralys. With the CAD$50M credit facility announced in February 2024—bringing total…

2025-01-22.title: JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs resist calls to roll back diversity
2025-01-22.description: JPMorgan Chase &amp; Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are pushing back on demands to roll back their diversity initiatives. Read more here

2025-02-11.title: Goldman Sachs Abandons IPO Diversity Pledge With US DEI Goals Under Fire
2025-02-11.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is abandoning a significant pledge it made to refuse initial public offering business with companies that had all White, male boards.

2025-02-13.title: Hydrostor Announces $200 Million in Funding from Leading Investors to Accelerate Canadian and Global Deployment of its Advanced Compressed Air Energy Storage Projects
2025-02-13.description: Funding round by Canada Growth Fund, Goldman Sachs Alternatives, and CPP Investments will support continued advancement of Hydrostor’s 7 GW of projects in North America, Australia, and Europe TORONTO — Hydrostor, a global long-duration energy storage (LDES) d…

2025-02-12.title: Goldman Sachs axes diversity rule that has 'served its purpose'
2025-02-12.description: The bank ditches a policy that stopped it acting on flotations for firms with an all male, all white board.

2025-02-27.title: Goldman Hits 80% of Sustainable Finance Target Even as DEI Cut
2025-02-27.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said it’s more than 80% of the way to meeting its 2030 goal of putting $750 billion toward supporting the transition to a low-carbon economy, and to advancing what it calls “inclusive growth.”

2025-03-04.title: Goldman CEO Solomon Sees Very Small Chance of US Recession
2025-03-04.description: There is a “very small” chance that the US economy tips into a recession, despite the uncertainty surrounding global trade policy, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer David Solomon.

2025-03-17.title: Goldman Cuts Oil Forecasts on Slow US Growth, OPEC+ Policy
2025-03-17.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. cut its oil price forecasts, as tariffs reduce the outlook for US growth while OPEC and its allies boost output.

2025-03-12.title: Goldman Sachs Warns of Stress on Corporate America From Tariffs
2025-03-12.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is turning more cautious on US credit and equity markets, becoming the latest on Wall Street to sound the alarm as the world’s largest economy is battered by President Donald Trump’s escalating trade war.

2025-03-19.title: SkySpecs Raises $20m to Fuel Global Growth and Innovation
2025-03-19.description: ANN ARBOR, Mich. — SkySpecs, a global leader in renewable energy asset health management, autonomous drone inspections, and tech-enabled software solutions, has raised $20 million in strategic growth capital led by Goldman Sachs Alternatives, with additional …

2025-03-26.title: Carney Recruits Ex-Goldman Banker Hodgson for Political Run
2025-03-26.description: Mark Carney recruited Timothy Hodgson, a former Goldman Sachs banker who was an adviser to him at the Bank of Canada, to run for the Liberal Party in the country’s election.

2025-03-25.title: Goldman Says End of Argentina FX Controls Key to Reviving IPOs
2025-03-25.description: Argentina President Javier Milei needs to start getting rid of capital and currency controls to lure equity investors and sustain a rally in the local stock market, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.

2025-03-31.title: Recession odds are rising as Trump’s trade war escalates, Goldman Sachs says | CNN Business
2025-03-31.description: The US economy faces a growing risk of a recession as surging tariffs threaten to stunt growth, reignite inflation and lift unemployment, according to Goldman Sachs.
